en.meta-description: PhD, CEO of Conecta GEM, and Specialist in Data Science, AI & ML. I translate complex Breeding & Statistics data into high-impact solutions.

en.footer-bio: PhD, CEO, and Data Scientist focused on applying AI and Machine Learning to solve complex challenges in Genetics.
en.about-p1: My journey is defined by the intersection of Genetics and Statistics. With a PhD in Genetics and Plant Breeding and deepening my studies as a PhD candidate in Applied Statistics and Biometrics, my passion has always been to find patterns in complex biological data and transform them into applicable knowledge.
en.about-p2: This passion for disseminating knowledge culminated in co-founding Conecta GEM, where I serve as CEO. Conecta GEM is an initiative focused on offering high-quality training, consulting, and mentorship to the scientific community. Leading this mission, we have already trained over a thousand people in technical courses on statistics and genetics, in addition to performing numerous specialized analyses.
en.about-p3: My technical expertise ranges from quantitative genetics and genomic selection to developing analysis pipelines (R and Python) and applying advanced models (Machine Learning and Neural Networks). I actively collaborate on cutting-edge research at the UFV Bioinformatics Laboratory and the Laboratory of Computational Intelligence and Statistical Learning (LICAE), where I also contribute to coordinating and mentoring research teams, joining efforts to advance the frontiers of biometrics and AI applied to agriculture.
en.service-desc1: I offer specialized consulting for research institutions and breeding companies, transforming raw data into strategic insights and actionable predictive models.
en.service-desc2: I am always open to new collaborations on research projects involving genetics, breeding, biometrics, and the application of artificial intelligence in agriculture.
en.service-desc3: I provide customized courses and training on using GENES software, R, Python, genomic selection, and machine learning for teams and researchers.
en.edu-title1: PhD in Applied Statistics and Biometrics
en.edu-desc1: Conducting research to develop and apply new statistical and machine learning models for complex problems in biometrics.
en.edu-desc2: Advanced research applying Machine Learning and Deep Learning to enhance the accuracy of genomic selection.
en.edu-desc3: Research focused on genomic selection and machine learning, collaborating on various genetic improvement projects.
en.edu-desc4: Data analysis (GWS/GWAS) for the NextGen Cassava project, aiming to develop resilient cassava cultivars.
en.edu-title5: PhD in Genetics and Plant Breeding
en.edu-desc5: Thesis focused on developing and validating Neural Networks (Deep Learning) for genomic prediction. Published in CSBJ (IF: 6.0).
en.edu-advisor5:
Advisor: Prof. Cosme Dami√£o Cruz.
Co-advisor: Prof. Moyses Nascimento.
en.edu-title6: M.S. in Genetics and Plant Breeding
en.edu-desc6: Dissertation focused on applying Meta-Analysis to evaluate genetic parameters in irrigated rice genotypes.
en.edu-advisor6:
Advisor: Prof. Alu√≠zio Bor√©m de Oliveira.
Co-advisor: Prof. Cosme Dami√£o Cruz.
en.edu-desc7: Final paper focused on experimental design and data analysis for the genetic improvement of irrigated rice.
en.exp-desc1: Analysis and modeling of complex traits, estimation of genetic parameters, and prediction of genetic values to optimize breeding programs.
en.exp-desc2: Application of mixed models, Genomic Wide Selection (GWS), and GWAS (Genome-Wide Association Study) for marker identification and the study of complex traits in quantitative genetics.
en.exp-desc3: Use of algorithms, neural networks, and AI for genomic prediction, genotype classification, and pattern identification in biological data.
en.exp-desc4: Development of automated data analysis pipelines in R and Python, with code versioning and project management on GitHub to ensure reproducibility and scientific collaboration.
en.exp-desc5: Planning and execution of breeding programs, from conducting experiments to selecting superior genotypes based on phenotypic and genomic data.
en.exp-desc7: Proficiency in statistical software such as GENES, Selegen, R, and Python for genetic and statistical data analysis with biometric models, covering everything from experimental statistics and biometrics to multivariate analyses for estimating genetic parameters.
en.licae-desc: LICAE is a multidisciplinary lab dedicated to proposing, evaluating, and applying Computational Intelligence and Statistical Learning techniques to solve complex problems in Agriculture. Our goal is to refine and complement traditional biometric methodologies, developing innovative projects in areas like Neural Networks, Genomic Selection, and Random Forest.
en.licae-item1: Research in neural networks and genomic selection
en.conecta-desc: Conecta GEM was born from a passion for sharing knowledge. We are an initiative that offers top-tier training, consulting, and mentorship in statistics, genetics, and breeding. With expert coordinators and a methodology focused on individual learning, we have already qualified over a thousand people, connecting university theory with market practice.
en.conecta-item3: Training and workshops in R and Python

en.privacy-intro-p: This Privacy Policy describes how personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit this website and use the contact form.
en.privacy-collection-p1: The only personal information we collect is what you voluntarily provide to us through the contact form. This includes:
en.privacy-collection-p2: We do not use cookies for tracking or collecting browsing data.
en.privacy-usage-p: The information provided in the contact form is used exclusively for the purpose of responding to your request or message. Your data will not be stored on this site, used for marketing purposes, or shared with third parties, except for the form processing service.
en.privacy-services-p: This website uses the following third-party services:

en.privacy-security-p: While no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, we take reasonable precautions to protect your information. This site's traffic is protected by HTTPS.
en.privacy-rights-p: You have the right to request information about the data you have provided and to ask for its deletion at any time by contacting me directly at wevertonufv@gmail.com.
en.privacy-changes-p: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. We recommend that you review this page occasionally to be aware of any changes.

en.lattes_summary: Agricultural Engineer (2015), M.S. in Genetics and Breeding (2018), and Ph.D. in Genetics and Breeding (2022) from the Federal University of Vi√ßosa (UFV). Currently, he is a Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Statistics at UFV and a postdoctoral fellow... He has consolidated experience in data analysis applied to genetics, serving as a postdoctoral researcher at Embrapa... He is also the co-founder and coordinator of Conecta GEM... training over a thousand participants... He has experience in the areas of plant breeding, quantitative genetics... with proficiency in software such as R, Python, GENES, and Selegen.
en.cv_pro_summary: As a PhD in Genetics & Breeding and Co-founder & CEO of Conecta GEM, my mission is to translate complex data into high-impact solutions. I connect cutting-edge science with practical application, developing Data Science, AI, and Machine Learning solutions focused on Breeding & Statistics. With experience in project leadership (Conecta GEM, LICAE) and pipeline development (Python, R), my focus is on generating real impact, both in the field and in academia.

bullets: Led the training and consulting initiative in Data Science, AI, and Genetics, training over 1,000 scientists and researchers across 15+ countries.
Coordinated the development and delivery of 10+ technical courses (R, Python, Statistics, ML), resulting in a 300% increase in student enrollment after the first year.
Provided specialized consulting services in statistical analysis and biometrics for companies and research groups.
Developed and automated genomic analysis pipelines (GWAS, GWS, Genomic Selection) for Embrapa's cassava breeding program.
Applied Machine Learning models (Random Forest) and mixed models for genomic prediction, increasing selection accuracy.
Optimized R and Python routines to reduce large-scale genotypic data processing time by ~40%.

portfolio_project_website.title: Personal Web Portfolio (CV Automation)
portfolio_project_website.description: I developed this site from scratch as a central hub for my roles (CEO, Researcher, Data Scientist). I set up R and Python routines that consume GitHub and Google Scholar APIs, automatically updating my project and publication lists. I implemented multilingual support (JavaScript i18n) and a 100% responsive design (HTML/CSS/JS) with a functional contact form.
